note.p: Owner of an indigo factory in Khulna, India. Natural history collector. A friend of Edward Blyth. Son of Warren Hastings Leslie Frith, colonel in the Bengal Artillery (1786/7–1854). Married Mary Anne Leighton (1811/12–70), daughter of David Bryce, in Bengal in 1851; she was a widow in St Andrews, Fife, 1861.
